oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: World War I era silk handkerchief
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Large square silk handkerchief printed in blue at center with crossed American flags, each with an oval inset of a doughboy (at left) or his sweetheart (at right). Beneath flags is printed: "Remember/Me." A banner at the bottom reads: "Sweet be to thee life's passing hours./And all thy path be decked with flowers." Sewn to each border is a strip of red, white, and blue miniature U.S. flags.
